0.1.name: wordpress/fancy-clock
0.1.description:
Fancy Clock Plugin can be used to display clock on sidebar of your blog. It is a plugin to show timing in a very attractive way, It is an animated way of showing timing on our webpage.

  • Show Clock according to your local time
  • Gives flexiblity to select your own GMT
  • Clock will display time according to selected GMT
  • Make your website attractive by using this fancy clock

If you have suggestions for a new update, feel free to email me at info@avigma.com .
